intro.p: This is the 0.8.3 release of the GStreamer Python bindings. It should be used with the 0.8.x series of GStreamer and GStreamer Plug-ins.
This is the fourth stable 0.8.0 gst-python release, it's now considered stable and ready to be used in production. It's already being used by serveral applications.

features.feature: Introduction of a "pygst" module allowing you to require a version
add GStreamer logging support from python
added modules to do jukebox mixed and levelled playback
